products.whyWeMadeThis: Train hard, not hot. Powered by Everlux™ fabric, the Wunder Train Contour Fit collection manages heat and sweat, while the adjusted hip-to-waist ratio fits your curves.

featurePanels.title: Our Fastest-Drying, Everlux™ Fabric(Click to Expand)
content: Feels cool and sleek on the inside, soft and brushed on the outside
Added Lycra® fibre for stretch and shape retention

featurePanels.title: Contour Fit, High Rise, 25" Length(Click to Expand)
content: Our Contour Fit has an adjusted hip-to-waist ratio. We narrowed the waistband so it doesn't gape and added more room through the hips and thighs to fit your curves
Check out our Size Guide to learn more about how Contour Fit styles measure up

featurePanels.title: Product Features(Click to Expand)
content: Waistband drawcord keeps your leggings in place so you don’t have to pull them up
Hidden pocket in the waistband has space for your card and keys
